Package poised

Class SearchAndViewProjects

java.lang.Object
poised.SearchAndViewProjects
public abstract class SearchAndViewProjects extends Object
Abstract class that allows a user to search and view the details of a Project object, as well as view all projects, view overdue projects and view incomplete projects retrieved from the list of projects.
Author:
Megan Bisschoff
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • searchProj

      public static Project searchProj(List<Project> projectList)
      Method searches for a specified project in the project list retrieved from the DB. Input is requested until the user inputs a valid searchNameOrNumber that matches either the project name or project number, then returns the project information along with its Manager, Engineer, Architect and Customer attributes.
      Parameters:
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
      Returns:
      string details of the selected project objects fields..

    • viewAllProj

      public static void viewAllProj(List<Project> projectList)
      Method displays each project object in the project list. It prints its toString information along with its Manager, Engineer, Architect and Customer attributes.
      Parameters:
      projectList - a list of the current projects.

    • viewIncompleteProj

      public static void viewIncompleteProj(List<Project> projectList)
      Method displays all project objects in the project list that are incomplete. It gets each projects finalisation status projFinalised and if "false" it prints out its toString information along with Manager, Engineer, Architect and Customer attributes.
      Parameters:
      projectList - a list of the current projects.

    • viewOverdueProj

      public static void viewOverdueProj(List<Project> projectList)
      Method displays all project objects in the project list that are past the set deadline. It checks each projects finalisation status projFinalised and whether the deadline projDeadline is before the current date. It prints out its toString information along with its Manager, Customer, Engineer and Architect attributes.
      Parameters:
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
